formatDescription: Animatic Film is an Atari animation format associated with the Animatic Animation System software by Kinetic Microsystems.
provenanceCompoundName: The National Archives and Records Administration / The National Archives and Records Administration
formatProvenance: 11/2023 (v.115)- Max-offset modified for BOF signature to allow for more exact signature identification. Internally researched.
